about_the_game:
"Feifei's Great Adventure" is a 2D platform jumping game. Players will play the role of an anthropomorphic kitten——Feifei, who uses precise jumping and coherent operations to find its owner who is lost in the forest. But please believe that there is no such a heavy story, this is just a journey full of joy and a little challenge.

The background of the game is probably like this:

In the mysterious forest, the kitten Feifei wakes up in a daze.
It first observed the peaceful surroundings, and then turned around. Under the reflection of the creek, it unexpectedly found that it had turned into a little girl like its owner. Speaking of the owner...she has not been seen since yesterday Yes, but I was a little worried (not because I was hungry) that she would not be eaten by a monster in this forest!
Time of crisis! Now it's up to you, Feifei, let us successfully rescue the owner in this "man-eating" forest, the big adventure of the little cat Feifei is about to begin... Damn it fell again, it seems that I still have to get used to walking on two legs (≧□≦)

Game Features

  • Explore the truth about the owner of the kitten lost in the forest, and try to avoid all dangerous paths;
  • Exquisite oil painting style scene, immerse yourself in it;
  • This work is rich in various achievements, and the collection elements are waiting for you to obtain;

About us

Following content will continue to be updated, you can also join our official QQ group: 760152147
Station B: Kitten Feifeifei; Weibo: @猫菲菲的大冒险
We are a new team from Chengdu, the main members are the heroine Feifei the cat and several wage earners.
Creation is not easy, everyone's feedback is our biggest motivation, I hope you can ask more questions and express suggestions, let us grow together quickly and become the king of cats (cross out)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
